attributes.action: Trident is a COLD War relic, who is it to protect us from!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If Trident is replenished, just who would it be used to protect us from?
Maybe if GB & USA provoke another war, then would it still be justified!

Spend the money on HM Forces(better wages & accomodation)hospitals & educational facilities, but NOT on more bloody nukes that are not required!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
